    public class DisplayDay
extends android.support.v7.app.AppCompatActivity
    Defines the display day activity where the user is shown the events for a single day, and what the ability to add an event for a specific day.
    Author:
    KWRP

      • jniCreateDbEvent

        public java.lang.String jniCreateDbEvent(java.lang.String title,
                                         java.lang.String description,
                                         java.lang.String start,
                                         java.lang.String finish,
                                         java.lang.String selectedDate,
                                         java.lang.String finishDate,
                                         java.lang.String repeat,
                                         java.lang.String filepath)
        Creates an event in the database
        Parameters:
        title - the title of the event
        description - the description of the event
        start - the start time of the event
        finish - the finish time of the event
        selectedDate - the start date of the event
        finishDate - the finish date of the event
        repeat - how often the event repeats (daily, weekly, monthly)
        filepath - path/to/database
        Returns:
        confirm if the event was created

      • jniUpdateEventDb

        public java.lang.String jniUpdateEventDb(java.lang.String title,
                                         java.lang.String description,
                                         java.lang.String start,
                                         java.lang.String finish,
                                         java.lang.String startDate,
                                         java.lang.String endDate,
                                         java.lang.String repeat,
                                         java.lang.String eventID,
                                         java.lang.String filepath)
        Updates an event
        Parameters:
        title - the title of the event
        description - the description of the event
        start - the start time of the event
        finish - the finish time of the event
        startDate - the start date of the event
        endDate - the finish date of the event
        repeat - how often the event repeats (daily, weekly, monthly)
        eventID - the event ID for the updated event
        filepath - path/to/database
        Returns:
        if the update was successful
